alert.note: Alert for Clay; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 29 at 4:55PM CST until December 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Webster County in north central Mississippi... Northwestern Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 454 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Embry, or 22 miles northeast of Winona, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Bellefontaine around 500 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mantee and Walthall. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
